title: Enchanting Chandana Haaram with Ruby Accents
materials: Crafted in 22K Gold with Hyderabadi Polish for a lasting luster. Adorned with meticulously set Cubic Zirconia (CZ) stones. Features a pear-shaped Ruby centerpiece
complemented by Emerald accents and delicate Ruby bead drops.
features: This Chandana Haaram boasts a contemporary design with intricate openwork detailing. The central floral motif, featuring the Ruby and Emerald gemstones, draws the eye. The cascading Ruby bead drops add a touch of traditional charm and movement.
colors: Predominantly gold with shimmering white CZ stones. The vibrant ruby red and emerald green provide a striking contrast and add depth.
occasions: and other special occasions. Its modern design also makes it suitable for festive gatherings and upscale events. Pairs beautifully with silk sarees or contemporary Indian attire.
description: This Haaram is a stunning blend of tradition and modernity. The Hyderabadi Polish ensures long-lasting shine, while the CZ stones provide exceptional brilliance. The ruby and emerald gemstone accents add a touch of royalty and sophistication. Its lightweight design ensures comfortable wear throughout the day.
